about_the_game:
Expand your vehicle collection with the Crocodile Pack to receive the seasoned Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck and its 3 unique add-ons!

Whatever the job, the versatile Step 33-64 “Crocodile” has seen it before. Hook up one of three custom trailers and get ready to deliver equal amounts of cargo and style.

The Crocodile Pack includes:
• The Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck
• A Sideboard add-on
• A Maintenance Frame add-on
• A Small Fuel Carrier add-on

The Crocodile Pack is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.
detailed_description:
Expand your vehicle collection with the Crocodile Pack to receive the seasoned Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck and its 3 unique add-ons!

Whatever the job, the versatile Step 33-64 “Crocodile” has seen it before. Hook up one of three custom trailers and get ready to deliver equal amounts of cargo and style.

The Crocodile Pack includes:
• The Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck
• A Sideboard add-on
• A Maintenance Frame add-on
• A Small Fuel Carrier add-on

The Crocodile Pack is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

name: SnowRunner - Crocodile Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200U 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 3.2 GHz / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Expand your vehicle collection with the Crocodile Pack to receive the seasoned Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck and its 3 unique add-ons! The Crocodile Pack is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
